textBeforeTable: Select from the following courses to meet the Restricted Elective requirements. Program Electives 1–3 Completion of at least twelve (12) college credits, minimum 2.6 grade point average, and be able to obtain a position related to student's academic or career goals (student's present job may qualify); OR permission of instructor Cooperative Education (1) or Cooperative Education (2) or Cooperative Education (3) or Special Projects (1) or Special Projects (2) or Special Projects (3) REC296WA or REC296WB or REC296WC or REC298AA or REC298AB or REC298AC RC 2–3 Permission of instructor Volunteerism for Recreation: A Service Learning Experience or Volunteerism for Recreation: A Service Learning Experience or Volunteerism for Recreation: A Service Learning Experience REC282AA or REC282AB or REC282AC RC 3 Restricted Elective RE 1–3 Any recreational activity modules not used to satisfy other required courses Any REC155 course or Any physical education activity modules REC155++ or PED+++ RC 3 Recreation Leadership REC250 RC 3 Outdoor Adventure Skills REC150AB RC
